Sports and Clubs: Scuba diving and other water sports
Social And Cultural Activities: Spastic Society of India; associated with Public Health Organisation to generate awareness on AIDS and drug abuse and to promote education; Nargis Dutt Memorial Charitable Trust: To raise funds and provide advanced medical equipment to hospitals in the country; Lina Ashar Foundation; Advisory Board-Wockhardt Foundation: Programmes carried out need based for the community
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Produced a documentary film-Biography on Smt. Nargis Dutt; and a research script on Child prostitution
Educational Qualifications: B.A. (Sociology) Post-Graduate Diploma (TV Production) ducated at Sophia College, Bombay University, Mumbai, Maharashtra and Centre for Media Arts, New York City, U.S.A.
Other Information: Took part in Padyatra from Mumbai to Amritsar for peace and harmony, 1987; and in peace march from Hiroshima to Nagasaki, Japan; participated in an expedition through the SAARC countries with her father; worked with the riot affected families during the Mumbai riots; worked and provided relief to the families affected by recent floods in Mumbai; worked with Spastic Society of India in promoting inclusion of children with disability in regular schools; and working towards accessibility for the disabled and trying to create public awareness on the same; (i) Board of Governors, National Institute of Fashion Technology; (ii) General Assembly and Governing Body,ICCR for 3 years (05.10.2009); and (iii) Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan for three years.
